name: signatu
goal:
signatu makes software and cloud services for safeguarding privacy.

With the signatu data protection tools:
- data controllers and data processors can comply with legal obligation and demonstrate compliance with the new EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), e.g. generate Privacy Policies and track data subjectsÂ´ consent, carry out DPIA and record keeping,
- data subjects can exercise their data protection rights,
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, Data Protection, General data protection regulation (GDPR), Copyrights
